summary: NASA plans to invest more than $82 billion in its major projects to continue exploring Earth, the moon, and the solar system. This is our 16th annual assessment of these projects. The projects' total overruns—when costs incurred are more than NASA planned for—decreased by over $3 billion in the last year. NASA's largest projects continue to have the biggest impact on these overruns. For example...
title: NASA: Assessments of Major Projects
